name: WestmoreLunch
0:
”Alexa, open lunch dad”
”Alexa, ask lunch dad what's for lunch today”
”Alexa, ask lunch dad what's for lunch tomorrow”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lunch dad
des: "Make meal planning a breeze with our Alexa skill designed to provide instant access to your school's daily lunch menu. Whether you're a parent planning ahead, a student deciding where to dine, or a staff member keeping up with the day's offerings, our skill has you covered. Just ask Alexa what's for lunch today or tomorrow, and get a detailed rundown of the menu, including main dishes, sides, and drink options. This skill connects directly to your school's lunch menu database, ensuring you always have the most current information at your fingertips. It's a perfect tool for busy families, curious students, and health-conscious individuals wanting to stay informed about their meal choices
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
